directions: Divide arugula evenly between 2 plates. Place blood orange slices and red grapefruit segments on the arugula and sprinkle pomegranate seeds on top.
Combine balsamic vinegar, caramel syrup, and sesame oil in a cup; mix to combine. Drizzle dressing over salads. Garnish each salad with almond slices and serve.
ingredients: 2  chilled blood oranges, peeled and sliced
¼ small chilled red grapefruit, peeled and segmented
title: Blood Orange Salad with Caramel Dressing
